description.en:
On the day of the Wizarding City Paz's destruction, Amina got stuck inside a lamp while trying to turn back time. And 300 years later, she was awakened by a military commander, Jakal.

“I do not have any wishes for you to grant.”
Well, I just want to hurry and grant a wish so I can go back, who the hell is this guy?
  
“Do you know who I am?”
“There is no one else in this world who knows you better than I do.”
“That’s not possible… I’ll disappear one of these days!”

Amina, who needs to go back into the lamp after granted the wishes suddenly meets Jakal who wants to give up his wishes to be with her. However, there are many dangers and threats that prevent him from doing so. Will Amina achieve her wish in the end?

---
Official Translations:
* [Simplified Chinese](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28238)
* [Traditional Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/romance/aminafromlamp/list?title_no=2059)
* [Indonesian](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Lampu-Ajaib-Amina/3355)
* [German](https://www.webtoons.com/de/romance/aminafromlamp/list?title_no=3262)
* [Thai](https://www.comico.in.th/titles/1870)

altTitles.ja: すいとーと！

description.en:
Momose is an ordinary college student who harbors two secrets. The first is that, despite posting lots of sweet and sugary foods onto her social media, she actually hates them and wants to eat more fatty, rich meals.   
  
And the second is…  


---

[Official Spanish (Mangaplus)](https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/titles/200048)
description.pt-br: Momo Momose é uma estudante universitária comum que guarda dois segredos. A primeira é que, apesar de publicar nas redes sociais muitos alimentos doces e açucarados, ela realmente os odeia e só quer saber mesmo é de comer refeições mais gordurosas e ricas em sabor. Outro segredo é que ela faz isso com uma amiga que leva ela para esses lugares maravilhosos, ambas mantem um relacionamento bem...

title.en: Otagai Dondon Hamatteiku Kyouikugakari to Shinnyuushain

altTitles.ja: お互いどんどんハマっていく教育係と新入社員

altTitles.ja-ro: Otagai Dondon Hamatteiku Kyouikugakari to Shinnyuushain

altTitles.en: The Mentor and the New Employee Who are Getting More and More Into Each Other

altTitles.ja: あ、それポンです！

description.en:
Fluffy Mahjong(?) Comedy!

The recently enrolled high schoolers Sena and Shiori are keen on joining the Mahjong Club, belonging to their senior friends: Natsume and Komachi. However! The Mahjong Club is at risk of disbanding! ...Reason being? That no one there can play mahjong!! 
Will they be able to remember the rules of the game before the club becomes disbanded!?

altTitles.ja: 秘密のミヅキ先生

description.en:
I want to find out the secret of the natural and slightly H Mizuki-sensei......!!!?

Tenma Akitaka, a curious junior high school boy, has something he can't stop thinking about. It's his homeroom teacher,  Mizuki-sensei. Her glasses and dull outfit gives her a plain appearance, but for some reason she always visits the old school building with her cute face!!!!

Tenma's intellectual curiosity gets the better of him and he decides to investigate her secret. However, the more he investigates his sensei, the more her naughty and natural happenings are revealed to Tenma! He is supposed to be investiigating her, but all he can do is satisfy his H-seeking curiosity! Can he keep up with Mizuki-sensei's naughty happenings and explore her secrets?

The teacher is a natural and satisfies your intellectual curiosity in this exciting, secret, observational romantic comedy...♪

altTitles.ja: 無限のスキルゲッター！

description.en:
During a Once-in-A-lifetime ceremony, the young boy, Yuri, receives the trash skill “Life transfer”, allowing him to transfer his life force to another person…
Crushed by despair after receiving the skill, Yuri encounters a woman who loses her life right in front of him. Wanting to be the one to decide who he gives his life to, he activates “Life Transfer”, dying on the spot. It had appeared as though the woman’s life was ended rather abruptly, however, the woman turned out to be the daughter of god. As a “thank you” for saving the life of his daughter, god resurrected Yuri, and in addition, gave him the ability to receive double the experience points each month.
With the endless amount of experience he gains, Yuri will leisurely walk the path to the world’s strongest, collecting endless amounts of skills along the way!
***
[Orignal webnovel](https://www.alphapolis.co.jp/novel/587737999/279349914)

title.en: Josou shite Off-Kai ni Sanka shite mita.

altTitles.en: I (♂) Cross-Dressed for the IRL (♀) Meetup

altTitles.ja: 女装してオフ会に参加してみた。

description.en: “Cocoa” has made three best friends in her online game, and she’s excited to meet them in real life at a dessert café for the first time. The only problem: She’s actually a man who’s been lying to them. What begins as a tense manga about online life quickly turns into a lighthearted comedy about friendship, gender, and forgiving yourself and others. [Kodansha]

title.en: Touhou Ibara Kasen ~ Wild and Horned Hermit.

altTitles.en: Eastern Thorned Poet Hermit ~ Wild and Horned Hermit.

altTitles.ru: Тохо Ибаракасэн ~ Дикий и Рогатый Отшельник

altTitles.ja: 東方茨歌仙　～ Wild and Horned Hermit.

altTitles.de: Der Rosenpoet des Ostens ~ Wild and Horned Hermit.

altTitles.uk: Тохо Ібаракасен ~ Дика та Рогата Відлюдниця

description.en:
In this 10 volume official Touhou series, spanning the time period of nine long years between the UFO and WBaWC games, we follow the misadventures of the business inept shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei and her ever-curious friend Marisa Kirisame, who meet a mysterious, young hermit woman named Ibara Kasen.  
  
Upon seeing how sloppily the Hakurei Shrine conducts its business, she decides to become a regular shrine visitor, determined to lend her near unlimited wisdom to the shrine maiden, in order to make her place a proper Shinto Shrine. Does the nagging, yet well meaning hermit bring nothing but good-will with her advice, or is there something more sinister hiding behind the friendly face and her bandaged arm?
description.pt:
De Zun, Wild and Horned Hermit é o último mangá da série Touhou, seguindo os passos de Silent Sinner in Blue, Inaba the Moon & Inaba the Earth e a triologia Sangetsusei.  
Desta vez, Marisa encontra uma misteriosa eremita fora da aldeia humana, No entanto, ela contou para Reimu sobre essa mulher, sendo vista ao redor do Santuário, ela é Ibara Kasen, uma estranha asceta com um braço enfaixado por causa de uma certa habilidade desconhecida da natureza, cujo mantem uma disciplina mais consciente do que elas e de qualquer um em Gensokyo.

altTitles.ja: 先輩VS後輩ちゃん
勘違いされる後輩ちゃん

description.en: A Kouhai wants to tease her senpai, but she has a weak defense.

A few years ago, Lihen’s daughter said.

“If mother ever lives again, don’t give birth to me.”

“What are you talking about all of a sudden?”

“You don’t have to give birth to me. Meet someone better than Dad. You said you had a first love. If you live again, confess. Who knows? Maybe it will work out?”

The mother and daughter giggled together.

Then Lihen Copland woke up. As a nineteen-year-old.

Living again didn’t change her life much. But maybe she could make her daughter a little happier. To do so, she would have to marry her husband again.
But that resolve soon began to waver.

After meeting her first love, Sir Schudermel Laft.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A7%88%EC%9D%B4-%EB%94%94%EC%96%B4-%EC%95%84%EC%8A%A4%ED%84%B0/3255), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60910874)

**Official Translations:**
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/138811)

altTitles.ja: ドラゴンボール角明

description.en: The story in Dragon Ball Kakumei picks up right after the Tournament of Power and deals with the consequences of Android 17 restoring the erased universes. In addition to the six universes destroyed by Zeno, the wish brought back Universe 19, which has warriors that are powerful enough to take down Zeno and the angels.
description.pt-br:
“Quando o desejo do Androide 17 no final do Torneio do Poder leva o mundo a uma Guerra Multiversal, aliados de todos os universos terão que se fortalecer para enfrentar divindades malignas e, desta vez, eles terão que defender todos sem Goku”.

Criado pelos franceses Darkows (roteiro), Reenko (roteiro) e Poissonlabo (desenhista), Dragon Ball Kakumei é um mangá não oficial que conta uma história alternativa se caso o desejo do Androide 17, ao fim do Torneio do Poder, restaurasse os 18 universos que existiam originalmente, levando a uma Guerra Multiversal entre grandes divindades, mas sem a presença de Son Goku.

Com uma arte atípica, em se tratando de um mangá feito por fãs (que geralmente costumam tentar emular os traços de Akira Toriyama), além de uma história com uma narrativa e proposta bem diferente da leveza e simplicidade da obra original, Dragon Ball Kakumei é, sem dúvidas, um dos mangás não oficiais de Dragon Ball mais famosos, ao lado de outros projetos de fãs como Dragon Ball AF e Dragon Ball Multiverse.

altTitles.ja: 怪異さんと俺

description.en:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/24367326/series/222807)

**Notes:**
- The Pixiv series does not contain all of the chapters and combines some. Do not follow the chapter numbering on Pixiv. Instead, enable Japanese chapters on MangaDex to see the proper chapter order and links to all of the raw chapters.
- This series uses characters the author used in illustrations beforehand.
description.ja: 俺くんと怪異さんのお話。

altTitles.ja: ヒッツ

altTitles.th: คู่หูนักฆ่ากับคดีสุดป่วน

description.en: A mysterious command given to Tomita Yuzu, whose livelihood is assassination. "Kill the one you meet now." However, what appeared in front of me was another self ...!? An unpredictable "Hitman's" action comedy presented by Yokusaru Shibata and Makoto Sawa's "Blue Striker" duo !!
description.ja: 暗殺を生業にしている豊田結途（トミタユズ）に下された謎の指令。 「今から会う奴を殺せ」。 しかし目の前に現れたのは、もう一人の自分で…!? 柴田ヨクサル×沢 真の『ブルーストライカー』コンビで贈る、予測不能の“殺し屋（ヒットマンズ）”アクション・コメディ!!
description.zh: 以暗杀为生的丰田结途，被下达了神秘的指令：“将接下来遇到的家伙杀掉”，但是，出现在自己眼前的，却是……！？柴田ヨクサル×沢 真组合继《Blue striker》后再次联袂献上的无法预测的“杀手（Hitmans）”动作喜剧！

description.en:
In this world, there is: Confucianism; Taoism; Buddhism, Demons, and Magicians. Xu Qi’an, a graduate from the police academy, suddenly finds himself waking up in prison, to be exiled to the border three days later …

His initial goal was to protect himself in this world with no laws, and to be able to live a leisurely life as a rich man..

Many years later, Xu Qi’an looks back on the past, and the long-dead enemies and friends, as well as the numerous bones he has left behind.

As the Yangtze River flows eastward, the waves wash away the heroes; right and wrong, success or failure will all turn into nothing but history. However, just like the sun’s rays gleaming over the towering mountains, after the sunset, a new sun will rise.

title.en: Touhou - The Tiles That I Cannot Cut Are Next to None!

altTitles.ru: Тохоу ~ Не осталось плиток, которые я могу разделить!

altTitles.ja: 切れぬ牌などあんまりない！

description.en: A mahjong craze has swept Gensokyo. Youmu, a total beginner at mahjong (with a completely useless ability at that), has no choice but to go against the top players of Gensokyo – for her mistress' honor and her own!
description.ru: Увлечение маджонгом охватило Генсокию. Юму, абсолютный новичок в маджонге (при этом совершенно никчемный), не имеет иного выбора, кроме как пойти против лучших игроков Генсокии - за честь своей хозяйки и свою собственную!

altTitles.ja: クベーラ

description.en:
Gods with everlasting lives. Sura who possess unrivaled power. And humans, caught helplessly in-between.  
When Kubera's peaceful village meets its fiery end, a mysterious magician named Asha comes to her rescue. Together they begin a journey in search of answers and revenge. Meanwhile across the realms, a web of entwined fates is growing tighter. One by one the other players of the game will emerge, each with their own agenda to pursue.  
At the center of this maelstrom stands Kubera, the girl with a god's name. Will this sixteen-year-old be the salvation of the world or its destruction?
description.it:
Dei immortali. Sura dai poteri impareggiabili. E gli umani, che si ergono fra loro impotenti.  
Quando il pacifico villaggio di Kubera incontra la sua fine, una misteriosa maga di nome Asha accorre in suo soccorso. Insieme intraprendono un viaggio in cerca di risposte e vendetta. Mentre attraversano il regno, una rete di destini intersecati sta nascendo… Una ad una le altre pedine della scacchiera emergono, ognuna all'inseguimento dei propri obiettivi.  
Al centro di quest'uragano si trova Kubera, la ragazza con il nome di un Dio. Questa sedicenne sarà la salvatrice di questo mondo… o la sua distruttrice?
description.pl:
Bogowie z nieśmiertelnymi żywotami  
Asury z niepojętą mocą  
I ludzie, pomiędzy nimi.  
Gdy wioska Kubery zostaje zniszczona, tajemniczy mag przychodzi jej na ratunek. Razem wyruszają w podróż w poszukiwaniu odpowiedzi i zemsty. Tymczasem pomiędzy wymiarami pajęczyna przeznaczenia coraz ciaśniej zaciska się… Jeden po drugim nowi gracze wkraczają na scenę, mając swoje własne powody. Historia młodej dziewczyny, która traci wszystko i zaczyna żyć zemstą.

altTitles.ja: ちょっとだけ抜けちゃう柊さん

description.en: Kotori-kun, who falls in love with his classmate Hiiragi-san at first sight, somehow wants to get close to her. Hiiragi-san is quite an earnest and lovely girl, but… She’s surprisingly a little careless--! This is about the charming school life of a careless girl and a pure boy who gets led on everyday by her -- a romantic comedy that’s a wee bit H sometimes but warm and fluffy to death.

altTitles.tr: Cross-dressing yaparken, yakışıklı bir adam beni yürüttü

altTitles.ru: Пока я был переодет в женскую одежду, ко мне пристал красивый парень!

altTitles.zh: 女装上街闲逛被帅哥搭讪了

altTitles.ja: イケメン女子と女装男子

altTitles.en: While Cross-Dressing, I Was Hit on by a Handsome Guy!

altTitles.ja-ro: Josou Shite Machi ni Kuridashitara Ikemen ni Nanpa Sareru Manga

description.en: While cross-dressing, I was hit on by a handsome guy, except she wasn't actually a handsome guy!
description.tr: Ceza olarak crossdressing yaparken yakışıklı bir adamla karşılaştım ve işi pişirdi.
description.pt-br: Por causa de uma brincadeira eu acabei tendo de me vestir de menina, então, sai às ruas, e nesse dia, acabei conhecendo alguém e minha vida está para mudar.

altTitles.ja: みつばものがたり 呪いの少女と死の輪舞《ロンド》

altTitles.ja-ro: Mitsuba no Monogatari - Noroi no Shoujo to Shi no Rondo

altTitles.en: Mitsuba's Stories - The Cursed Girl and the Circle-Dance of Death (Rondo)

description.en:
This world revolves around me.

While sleeping in a "deathly" boring dark world, Mitsuba woke up from a long sleep with a mysterious all-powerful feeling, the girl was destined to die, but the magic that was poured into her for 10 years brought the power of a "curse" that should not exist in this world.

Her stepmother, fearing Mitsuba's "death," takes away her aristocratic nature and she is  enrolled n a military academy. However, this was only the beginning of Mitsuba's use of the "curse" to pursue her own path.

The powerful "curse" that resides in a small girl causes a unique tale of otherworldly devastation!

altTitles.ja: 幸せの住処

description.en: The girl who was adopted by two mothers met her soulmate- another girl, when she was 16 years old. After dating for ten years, she decided to give herself to a man at the age of 28 … because she did not want to live this "abnormal life". Only after leaving her, did she finally understand the true meaning of love during those countless days and nights. However, can they still go back to the way things were?

altTitles.ja: おそとごはんをご一緒に

altTitles.zh: 邀你一起在户外共进美餐

altTitles.id: Ayo makan di Luar ruangan bersama

description.ja:
アパートの狭いキッチンに悩む料理好きの女子大生・風香が出会ったのは、料理が苦手で破天荒なアウトドア女子・よもぎだった。
成り行きで始まったたふたりのおそとごはんは、なんだかとっても温かくて…
女ふたりの助け合いアウトドアグルメ漫画スタート！

title.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

altTitles.en: She is the neighbor Angel, I am spoilt by her.

altTitles.ja-ro: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

description.en:
A HEAVENLY ENCOUNTER!
Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!

*Adapted from the Light Novel with the same name, 
Serialized in Square Enix Web Magazine [Gangan Online](https://www.ganganonline.com/title/1480)*
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

altTitles.ja: 明け星のジェニィ

description.en:
The self-proclaimed Wilderness Jenny is a nature conservation officer in charge of terrestrial regeneration. One day, she picks up Flora, a girl with amnesia who was in a capsule that flew from the sky.

Together with Flora, Jenny goes on a journey to revive the earth while solving problems in cities filled with thugs and monsters.

Jenny, a conservation officer, and Flora, a mysterious girl, explore a western-style far-future world!
description.ja:
自称・荒野のジェニィは地上の再生を担当する自然保護官。ある日上空より飛来したカプセルに乗っていた記憶喪失の少女・フローラを拾う。
ジェニィはフローラと共にならず者やモンスターがひしめく街々の問題を解決しながら地上再生の旅をする。

自然保護官・ジェニィと不思議少女・フローラが西部劇風遠未来世界を大開拓！

title.en: Yuusha-sama, Sakuya mo Otanoshimi deshita ne.

altTitles.ja: 勇者様、昨夜もお楽しみでしたね。

altTitles.ja-ro: Yusha-sama, sakuya mo otanoshimi deshita ne.

altTitles.en: Hero-Sama, I Hope You Had Fun Last Night.
Hero Last Night Was Pumped Wasn’t It?

description.en:
"I did it again...!"

The Hero who can't seem to set out on his journey!!

The protagonist, who was reincarnated into another world, becomes a hero and receives the task of defeating the Demon King. To repay the world that accepted him , he decides to set out on a journey... However, he can't seem to leave the first village, as he is constantly tempted by charming heroines such as the female priestess, his childhood friend who is a magician, and so on!

Thus, the birth of the "I did it again...!" type hero!

altTitles.ja: 軍靴のバルツァー
Gunka no Baltzer
Gunka no Balzer

altTitles.fr: Baltzar: La guerre dans le sang

description.en:
Glory is won over the roar of cannon fire. Peace exists simply as a time to prepare for the next battle. In a nation with superb military power, Bernd Baltzar advanced quickly through the ranks. However, his career now takes a sudden turn when he is reassigned to being the military advisor in a neighboring allied nation with little military power and a lack of civilian support of firearms. Will Major Baltzar be able to win the hearts and minds of both the soldiers and civilians in this country?  

---

**Retail Links:**  
- [Amazon: French volumes](https://www.amazon.fr/dp/236877890X/)  
- [Kinokuniya: Japanese volumes](https://united-states.kinokuniya.com/bw/9784107723499/)  
- [Korean volumes](http://www.kyobobook.co.kr/product/detailViewKor.laf?mallGb=KOR&ejkGb=KOR&barcode=9791134855451&orderClick=JAj)  
- See retail section below for two further avenues.

title.en: The Strongest Lv1 Support in the World

description.en: “Even if I can only use primary healing skill, I still want to become the strongest!” The LV1 healer boy and the weakest God’s chosen girl started their journey with the goal of becoming the strongest. However, the Young man did not expect that this time would be his last journey.
description.id: “Bahkan jika aku hanya bisa menggunakan teknik penyembuhan dasar, aku ingin menjadi yang terkuat!” Seorang bocah healer level 1 dan gadis pilihan dewa terlemah memulai perjalanan mereka dengan tujuan menjadi yang terkuat.  Namun, pemuda itu tidak menyangka bahwa kali ini akan menjadi perjalanan terakhirnya.

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

altTitles.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
A story about an old ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

altTitles.ja: ガンニバル

description.en: When a police officer is posted to a remote village in the countryside, little does he realize he's encroaching on a community of cannibals…
description.ru:
Полицейский Дайго Агава вместе с семьёй переезжает в горную деревушку под названием Цветочная. Жители деревни горячо принимают семью Дайго.
Однажды в лесу находят труп старушки. После этого происшествия Дайго постепенно начинает осознавать все происходящие вокруг странности и приходит к мысли, что в этой деревне едят людей. Начинают происходить очень странные инциденты, атмосфера отчуждения наполняет деревню. Сможет ли обычный полицейский разгадать все ужасные тайны, которая таит в себе эта деревня и, что важнее, сможет ли он остаться в живых?

altTitles.ja: 笑顔のたえない職場です

altTitles.en: A Workplace Where You Can't Help But Smile

description.en: New shoujo manga artist Nana Futami works hard every day while being supported by Kaede Satou, her female editor who is older than her, and Mizuki Hazama, her assistant. According to the girl herself, she sometimes drums up intense daydream delusions of occupational illness! A working girls comedy set in the entertainment industry, brought to you by an author who always draws various girls.
description.ko: 신인 작가 후타미는 본인이 말하길 망상은 직업병! 이라며 담당 사토 씨와 어시스턴트 하 씨에게 도움을 받으면서 오늘도 열심히 일한다! 만화계에서 일하는 어른의 청춘군상극. 대상 독자는 만화를 사랑하는 모든 사람 입니다.

description.zh:
“青春是什么？羞耻+矫情+自以为是+自我意识过剩+……” 高校男生南号、尚风是从小玩到大的死党。这是关于他们最纯粹的友谊，最热闹、无厘头的校园青春故事！

description.en:
As the monster slayer troops, also known as 'Sretu', no longer functioned as it used to, humans became monster feed.
'Jin Cheongdo', who has been living in a world full of monsters for his entire life, uses a legendary item 'Midwood', to turn back in time, for the sake of killing 'Ian' who was the centerpiece of this whole mess...
description.ko:
괴물처치부대 '스레투'가 사라진 지금. 인간들은 괴물들의 먹이가 되었다.
괴물이 가득한 세상에서 평생을 살아온 '진청도'는
전설의 아이템 '미드우트'를 이용해 과거로 가서
이 사태를 초래한 '이안'을 죽이려 하는데...

altTitles.th: ใต้ร่มวันฝนพรำ

description.en:
Sisters Ju-eun and Hye-jin lived a miserable life. After the death of their mother, their 'father', who had always been absent from their lives, suddenly appeared. Hye-jin, the older sister, agreed to his suggestion: if one of them joins the 'Daesung Group', he will rescue them from their poverty-stricken life. However... three years after entering 'Daesung Group', she dies in vain. This left Ju-eun struggling with despair at her helplessness in preventing her sister’s death. But then, she gets a new opportunity when she is brought back in time and Ju-eun decides to take her sister's place by becoming the daughter of the 'Daesung Group' that killed Hye-jin.

---
Sisters Ju-eun and Hyejin grew up in absolute poverty. After their mother’s death, Hyejin accepts the offer to join their estranged father’s wealthy family. But when Hyejin turns out dead just three years later, Ju-eun is grief-stricken. She grabs at the chance to travel back in time and take her sister’s place where she meets the kind but mysterious Iho.

description.en: The anime, "Himitsu no AiPri," is now available as a cute full-color 4-Koma! The main characters are Himari Aozara and Mitsuki Hoshikawa, who enroll in the private Paradise Academy. Himari, who longs to be in AiPri, dreams of making 10,000 friends! She unexpectedly makes her AiPri debut?! She has a secret that she can't even tell her close friend, Mitsuki! However, it seems Mitsuki holds a secret of her own as well... (Translated from Ciao website)

A fabled genius at killing resides somewhere hidden in Tokyo. Taught since childhood to obey the orders of his boss, he is ordered to live in Osaka as a normal person for one year in order for the boss to lay low.    ---- **Won the 41st Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2017**

altTitles.uk: Неймовірні пригоди Джоджо частина 7: Перегони "Сталева Куля"

description.en:
In the American Old West, the world's greatest race is about to begin. Thousands line up in San Diego to travel over six thousand kilometers for a chance to win the grand prize of fifty million dollars. With the era of the horse reaching its end, contestants are allowed to use any kind of vehicle they wish. Competitors will have to endure grueling conditions, traveling up to a hundred kilometers a day through uncharted wastelands. The Steel Ball Run is truly a one-of-a-kind event.  
  
The youthful Johnny Joestar, a crippled former horse racer, has come to San Diego to watch the start of the race. There he encounters Gyro Zeppeli, a racer with two steel balls at his waist instead of a gun. Johnny witnesses Gyro using one of his steel balls to unleash a fantastical power, compelling a man to fire his gun at himself during a duel. In the midst of the action, Johnny happens to touch the steel ball and feels a power surging through his legs, allowing him to stand up for the first time in two years. Vowing to find the secret of the steel balls, Johnny decides to compete in the race, and so begins his bizarre adventure across America on the Steel Ball Run.
description.hu:
Amerikában a régi vadnyugaton, a világ legnagyobb szabású versenye hamarosan kezdődik. Ezrek állnak rajzvonalhoz San Diegoban, hogy utazzanak több mint hat ezer kilómétert annak reményében, hogy megnyerhetik az ötven millió dolláros fődíjat. A lovak kora elérkezett a végéhez, így a versenyzők szabadon használhattak bármiféle járművet. A versenyzőknek el kell majd tűrniük a fárasztő körülményeket, naponta több mint, száz kilómétert megtéve felfedezetlen vidékeken. A Steel Ball Run egy igazán egyedülálló esemény.

A fiatalos Johnny Joestar, egy tolószékes korábbi lovas versenyző, eljött San Diegoba, hogy megnézze a verseny rajtját. Itt találkozik Gyro Zeppelivel, egy versenyzővel két acél golyóval a derekán fegyver helyett. Johnny szemtanúja lesz annak, hogy Gyro használja az egyik acélgolyóját, szabadjára engedve annak erejét, hogy arra kényszerítsen egy férfit egy párbaj közben, hogy lőjje le magát. Az ütközet közepette, Johnny megérinti az
acélgolyót és érezte, hogy egy erő végigáramlik a lábán, rábírva őt arra, hogy felálljon először két év után. Megfogadja, hogy rájön, hogy mi a titka az acélgolyóknak, Johnny eldönti, hogy indul a versenyen, így kezdődik el az ő bizarr kalandja Amerikán keresztül a Steel Ball Runban.
description.uk: Вересень 1980. Дикий Захід. Америка. Жокеї зі всього світу чекають гонку "Сталева Куля", яка ось-ось розпочнеться. Тисячі людей вишиковуються в Сан-Дієго, щоб подолати понад шість тисяч кілометрів заради шансу отримати головний приз — п’ятдесят мільйонів доларів. Юний Джонні Джостар, каліка, колишній жокей та популярний скакун, приїхав до Сан-Дієґо, щоб подивитися на старт перегонів. Там він зустрічає Джайро Цеппелі, гонщика з двома сталевими кулями на талії замість револьвера, звичної зброї для жителів. Джонні бачить, як Джайро використовує одну зі своїх сталевих куль, змушуючи людину вистрілити з рушниці в себе під час дуелі. Поклявшись знайти таємницю сталевих куль, Джонні вирішує взяти участь у гонці. Так і починається його химерна пригода.
description.pt-br:
Conta a história da Épica batalha entre a família Joestar e sua longa geração contra as forças Malignas, tais como Vampiros e Usuários de Stands.
Cada arco da série corresponde a um vilão e a um membro importante da família Joestar.
Gênero: Ação, Aventura, Sobrenatural, Luta
Autor: Hirohiko Araki 
Demografia: Shonen/Seinen
Ano de publicação: 1987 - Presente
Número de Volumes: 101 - Ainda em publicação

A story of a love-pentagon between salad, bacon, tomatoe, and twin bread brothers that gonna make your stomach grumble. Read it whenever you are hungry.

title.en: Kuzu Rouninsei, Jinsei ga Tsurai no de Yoru no Onee-san wo Yondemita

altTitles.ja: クズ浪人生、人生が辛いので夜のお姉さんを呼んでみた

altTitles.en: A Scummy Gap Student With a Hard Life Calls Upon a Lady of the Night
Failed University Exams, I am Trash and Life is Hard, so I Tried Calling an Onee-san at Night

description.en: Makino failed her college entrance exam. Her only comfort is in her 2D game characters... until she found an ad for a call-girl who looked exactly like her favorite in-game waifu! The yuri love comedy between a gullible young woman and a street-wise call-girl begins now!

Every 50 years, a battle royale between multiple clans commences in order to achieve the head title "Family Guy" and become the ruling head of all the sorcerer clans. Each clan chooses their own specific representative of their clans, each gambling his or her own life for the title. The only difference is compared to the previous wars, the battlefield takes place within Quahog City, the ground zero for the Ghetto Rays incident.

Bloodedge the Griffin, and agent of Shinra, a special unit directly affiliated with the government and created to deal with supernatural phenomena, monsters, and such is tasked to investigated the Ghetto Rays infested area not knowing of the violent war that is about to approach him.

title.en: The Fragrant Flower Blooms With Dignity

altTitles.ja: 薫る花は凛と咲く

altTitles.es-la: La fragante flor florece con dignidad

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

altTitles.th: ดอกรักผลิบานที่กลางใจ

altTitles.ja: #薫る花

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana Wa Rin To Saku

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High. This is the story of two people who are so close and yet so far apart.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

altTitles.ja: 奈落の花園
ウィンドブレイカー

description.en: Haruka Sakura wants nothing to do with weaklings—he's only interested in the strongest of the strong. He's just started at Furin High School, a school of degenerates known only for their brawling strength—strength they use to protect their town from anyone who wishes it ill. But Haruka's not interested in being a hero or being part of any sort of team—he just wants to fight his way to the top!
description.fr:
Haruka Sakura est le genre de lycéen qui fait passer la baston avant les révisions. Fraîchement débarqué en ville, c'est donc le sourire aux lèvres qu'il compte pousser les portes du lycée Fûrin, l'établissement scolaire au pire taux de délinquance du pays... Les intentions de Haruka sont claires : se mesurer aux meilleurs bagarreurs de ce bahut et devenir le meilleur de tous ! Mais entre-temps, il se retrouve mêlé à une altercation avec une bande de brutes dans un des quartiers de la ville, avant d'être sauvé in extremis par des élèves de son lycée. Haruka réalise alors à quel genre de phénomènes il risque d'avoir affaire...

Maison d'édition FR : Pika
description.pt-br: A Fûrin High School ganhou a pior reputação entre as escolas da região por ter a média mais baixa e os alunos mais rebeldes. E nela ingressa Haruka Sakura, um jovem que acaba de chegar na cidade, que busca ser o mais forte para poder proteger todos com quem se importa. Para atingir seu objetivo, porém, a primeira coisa que ele deve fazer é se juntar a uma gangue chamada Wind Breaker, que representa seu instituto e cujo objetivo é defender a cidade de outras gangues e bandidos. No entanto, para que eles o aceitem, ele terá que ganhar o respeito deles com os punhos!

title.en: Sekai ni Hitori, Zenzokusei Mahou no Tsukaite

altTitles.ja: 世界に一人、全属性魔法の使い手

description.en: After a traffic accident, Zenichi Kiyama, a humble office worker, was reincarnated as a baby in a different world called "perfect compatibility". However, the result of his attribute appraisal with crystal was "dark attribute". The worst result is that he is a demon child...! ?
description.id: Setelah kecelakaan lalu lintas, Zenichi Kiyama, seorang pekerja kantoran yang rendah hati, bereinkarnasi sebagai bayi di dunia berbeda yang disebut "kompatibilitas sempurna". Namun, hasil apresiasi atributnya dengan kristal adalah "atribut hitam". .! ?

altTitles.ja-ro: Dame Skill [Jidou Kinou] ga Kakuseishimashita ~Are, Guild no Scout-san, Ore wo "Iranai"-tte Itte Masendeshita?~

description.en:
Young boy Claus was gifted with a Skill called [Auto Mode]. It is an extremely rare skill and he was so pleased when first received it...

Turns out, the skill's abilities [Auto Return] for "only to go home" and [Auto Travel] for "only to go to places that have been visited" are a completely useless ability for both combat and making money!

However, the now leveled up Claus has come to know the true nature of [Auto Mode]!

---

(JP) [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2757gs/) [Light Novel](https://kc.kodansha.co.jp/title?code=1000040012)
description.ja: １５歳の少年クラウスが教会で授かったのは発現自体が珍しいというユニークスキル！　将来は勇者か英雄かと胸を高鳴らせた少年だがその夢は無残にも打ち砕かれる…。スキル【自動機能】は[自動で家に帰れるだけ]のてんで役立たずな外れスキルだったからだ！　スキルレベルが上がればと期待を抱くが、レベル2は[自動で行ったことのある場所へ移動するだけ]、レベル３は[自動で資源を採取するだけ]とがっかりする。ところが念のためクラウスが試してみると…！？

altTitles.ja: Onna Senshi tte Motenai desu ne!

altTitles.en: The female Knight became too strong
The Female Warrior is not popular!
Who Says Warriors Can't be Babes?

altTitles.ja: 女戦士ってモテないんです！

altTitles.pt-br: Quem Disse Que Guerreiras Não Podem Ser Donzelas?

description.en: Warrior Woman doesn't want much out of life, other than to get Hero to fall in love with her. But no matter how hard she tries to show off her feminine side, he only sees her as a fellow adventurer. Maybe that's because she's the strongest fighter alive—strong enough to slay a dragon with a single blow! Does Warrior Woman have what it takes to win Hero's heart without accidentally killing him in the process?
description.pt-br: A Mulher Guerreira não quer muito da vida, a não ser fazer com que o Herói se apaixone por ela. Mas não importa o quanto ela tente mostrar seu lado feminino, ele só a vê como uma companheira de aventura. Talvez seja porque ela é a lutadora mais forte do mundo – forte o suficiente para matar um dragão com um único golpe! A Mulher Guerreira tem o que é preciso para conquistar o coração do Herói sem matá-lo acidentalmente no processo?

altTitles.ja: 天使禁猟区-東京クロノス-

description.en: The manga takes place after the story of Tenshi Kinryouku, but it is an independent work.

altTitles.ja: こちら葛飾区亀有公園前派出所
こち亀

altTitles.en: This is the Police Station in Front of Kameari Park, Katsushita Ward

altTitles.tr: Burası Katsushita Bölgesi, Kameari Parkı Önündeki Polis Karakolu

description.en:
The typical Kochikame plot involves Ryo-san coming up with a money-making scheme by inventing a new gadget or capitalizing on a fad, achieving great success, calling on Nakagawa's help as things turn sour, and finally losing it all as the fad runs out of steam or out of control. While the plots are gag-driven, much of the humor comes from the juxtaposition of mundane characters with the bizarrely incongruous (Nakagawa's wealth, Maria's appeal, everyone's lack of actual police work), most of which is never explained or rationalized in the slightest.

---
- **Won the 30th Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize in 2001**
- **Won the 50th Shogakukan Manga Award Special Jury Prize in 2004**
- **Won the Seiun Award for Best Comic in 2017**
- **The Previous Holder of the Guinness World Record for Most Volumes of a Single Manga Series**

“I was given a building as an inheritance?”

From a nobody who does all kinds of odd jobs and lived a hard life, he was given a chance to become a landlord right in the middle of Gangnam!

But, the condition for this inheritance is to ‘operate a restaurant for 5 years.’

‘Moreover, I can sense a chill down my spine thanks to the weird customers that came in for today’s store opening……Do I really just need to prepare food?’

“So then…all the guests who came in yesterday…”

“They were ghosts.”

Every night starting from 11 o’ clock until 1 o’clock, we will now be open!
